alert.note: Alert for Southern Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:55PM MST until February 21 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet from Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches through this evening. * WHERE...Southern Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 2 PM Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on mountain routes into this evening. Significant winter driving conditions can be expected Tuesday into Wednesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
